DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this trial is to evaluate the efficacy of type-5 phosphodiesterase inhibitors (sildenafil) in primary and secondary pulmonary hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Type-5 Phosphodiesterase Inhibitors in Primary and Secondary Pulmonary Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: Patients with primary and secondary pulmonary hypertension will be recruited and admitted to the ICUs of the National Taiwan University Hospital. Each patient will undergo Swan-Ganz catheterization and hemodynamic monitoring during administration of sildenafil. Efficacy of inhaled NO and Iloprost will also be compared.
DOC.criteria: Patients with primary and secondary pulmonary arterial hypertension Unstable patients or patients with allergy to sildenafil
